title: need ride (la vergne to el paso)
shortDescription: me my two daughters and granddaughter need a ride near the el paso area from nashville tn. it would really help out if we could get a free ride but we are willing to pay. message back asap.

title: heading to colorado 11/15 (charleston, wv)
